59a72f47-c2dd-42e7-97c2-1af42ddb3372.body: Here we create a filter by day of the week so that your chatbot opens only on Mondays to Fridays. Customize according to your business.
59a72f47-c2dd-42e7-97c2-1af42ddb3372.title: Filter by day of the week

919d977b-ae93-4bc4-9957-f1030d48ec82.body: Here we create a filter by hour so that your chatbot opens only from 08:00 to 18:00. Customize according to your business.
919d977b-ae93-4bc4-9957-f1030d48ec82.title: Filter by hour

e950e6a0-5bd9-4513-b0fe-b3b6cfd70dd3.body: Here we create a filter by department. Customize according to your business, if you want more service areas.
e950e6a0-5bd9-4513-b0fe-b3b6cfd70dd3.title: Filter by department

actions.text: Unfortunately, our support is not available at the moment. Please contact again from 8:00 to 18:00 on Mondays to Fridays. It was great talking to you!
Wait, you will be attended soon.
Unfortunately, our support is not available at the moment. Please contact again from 8:00 to 18:00 on Mondays to Fridays. It was great talking to you!

Your support has been finalized. When you need me, I'm here!

See you later 👋

11b522ff-c9e6-44ea-88e8-94585d54b6e8.body:
This message treats all user questions that were understood by the intelligence as OUT OF CONTEXT.

If you want, personalize this message to better direct your user in relation to the type of content that your chatbot can help with.
11b522ff-c9e6-44ea-88e8-94585d54b6e8.title: Out of context treatment

527f9e44-95b4-49ad-83dd-2418b6b3f6db.body: Feel free to change this message and customize it according to your business and the tone of voice of your brand.
527f9e44-95b4-49ad-83dd-2418b6b3f6db.title: Message

79942c14-ba26-4271-a803-2678846be0b6.body:
ALL CARDS THAT HAVE GREEN NOTES CAN BE CUSTOMIZED ACCORDING TO YOUR BUSINESS. 

If you have any questions, ask for help in our community, we will be happy to help you. Access the community at https://comunidade.weni.ai
79942c14-ba26-4271-a803-2678846be0b6.title: ATTENTION

7e21fc5c-1789-4db7-b8b9-aec15ad2d0ce.body:
Feel free to personalize your goodbye message. 

If you want, add a satisfaction survey to know how your users are experiencing your service.
7e21fc5c-1789-4db7-b8b9-aec15ad2d0ce.title: Farewell

851139c5-a7ae-430c-88eb-5c2d96b41a3a.body: Here we connect the Weni intelligence to check if the user's intention is to be attended by a human, if so, we direct them to the support flow.
851139c5-a7ae-430c-88eb-5c2d96b41a3a.title: Intelligence

85ab7ec6-f980-499f-9757-9556f004235d.body:
After receiving a response, the user is redirected again to the Await Response card if they have more to ask or make a final interaction with the chatbot.

Otherwise, the flow will end when it expires. If you want to customize the expiration time of your flow, go to Edit in the top right corner and edit the expiration time.
85ab7ec6-f980-499f-9757-9556f004235d.title: Received response from AI

d916272a-6855-4e1f-84f5-84bea7e74a2d.body: This is the flow that makes the request to the intelligences in order to treat and give the best answer to the user
d916272a-6855-4e1f-84f5-84bea7e74a2d.title: [GPT3.5 Turbo] Conversation

ebcd8f05-6d2c-4fa0-95d9-c23573982168.body:
Here we wait for the user's message. If you want to add filters or treat any menu option, feel free to add rules in this card. 

Remember to add rules of type "Has only the phrase", so that any other text typed is categorized as "Other" and is directed to the intelligence flow.
ebcd8f05-6d2c-4fa0-95d9-c23573982168.title: Await response

ef846f77-88e8-4f44-95b5-345c1ce80d38.body: Here we check if there is a user message to be analyzed by the intelligence.
ef846f77-88e8-4f44-95b5-345c1ce80d38.title: Has message

actions.text: Hi @contact.first_name, how can I help you today?

Bye 👋

When you need me, I'm here!

I don't deal with that... 

Choose one of the options or ask something else.

11076be9-0d51-490a-a20f-ae3b22e62ba8.body: Here we make the request to Open AI informing the important information of security principles, personality, content that must be used for the answer, last question, last answer, the user's message and the prompt so that the answer is in line with your business.
11076be9-0d51-490a-a20f-ae3b22e62ba8.title: Webhook

4c1cca9d-5b78-4d48-aab8-954a94927d1f.body: Here we check if the global has content.
4c1cca9d-5b78-4d48-aab8-954a94927d1f.title: Content verification

52b49352-1689-4301-9d76-023390607033.body: Here we check if the response from Intelligence has an emoji, if so, it means that the user sent a question outside the chatbot's context, so we treat it so that we can navigate through the entire knowledge base to find the correct answer.
52b49352-1689-4301-9d76-023390607033.title: Response

5d1a2619-68c9-4321-8e35-4891244f4145.body:
Now you are called Poli, and you are a personal assistant at VEM Urbana.
You are very serious and practical. You are 35 years old and have 2 children, so you know that your time is precious. You love English rock from the 70s and like to read books. You always want to be up to date with all the news from the world. On weekends you usually go to church and walk with your family.

You are also a salesperson for the company's solutions, but you do not buy anything from another company and do not make purchase requests.

Your answers are always formal and direct.
5d1a2619-68c9-4321-8e35-4891244f4145.title: Personality

9c060e4a-a43b-424f-90f2-1d9b71a6b63b.body:
In this result we are saving a message so that the Intelligence answers with an emoji for everything that is outside the context or outside the list of principles.

At the end of the flow we check if the answer was the Emoji and treat it accordingly.
9c060e4a-a43b-424f-90f2-1d9b71a6b63b.title: Post Prompt

c1d4c1df-f826-4a54-951e-7c4116d6550b.body: Here we give the response returned from Open AI to the user and save this last answer in the contact field.
c1d4c1df-f826-4a54-951e-7c4116d6550b.title: Message

ed616ccc-8e9d-4747-ae2d-92f3a2ff9f0a.body: Here we save the content of the contact field that saves the last user message so that we can save the new message in this contact field and send these two messages in the request to Open AI.
ed616ccc-8e9d-4747-ae2d-92f3a2ff9f0a.title: Last question

ef20a953-2df1-4761-87db-b6268c3dfa96.body: Here we save "false" if the Intelligence returned an Emoji.
ef20a953-2df1-4761-87db-b6268c3dfa96.title: Out of context treatment

f037fc0b-775a-4976-85ee-4e000fde1d3a.body:
This is the flow that connects the user's message with the Open AI, consulting the best answer for the user within your Content global.

Don't worry, you won't need to edit this flow so that it works.

The requirements to use this flow are:

1. Fill in the "Chatgpt Token" global correctly

2. Create your bot's personality and fill in the "Personalidade" global

3. Review the "Security Principles" global "Principios Seguranca" to see if they are in line with your business.

4. Fill in your Content globais.
f037fc0b-775a-4976-85ee-4e000fde1d3a.title: IMPORTANT

f5365088-ca35-4abf-86c7-448a886978dc.title: Security Principles

actions.name: Post Prompt
actions.value: If this question is not in the context or in the list of principles, respond with the emoji "😕"

actions.text: Unfortunately we don't have an answer to your questions at the moment, contact the responsible department.
